org.openhubframework.openhub.core.throttling

Class ThrottleCounterMemoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.throttling.ThrottleCounterMemoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThrottleCounter

    public class ThrottleCounterMemoryImpl
extends Object
implements ThrottleCounter
    In-memory implementation of ThrottleCounter interface.

    Fast and enough-solution for one server solution but it's not sufficient for cluster environment.

    Author:
    Petr Juza
